events.message: Policyholder reported a vehicle collision involving another car at an intersection during rush hour.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the reported vehicle collision event.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim promptly to ensure proper assistance.
The claim acknowledgement message was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and providing next steps clearly.
Official request for accident photographs, police report, and driver's license was sent to support claim processing.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair estimates in a timely manner.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle accident began to verify the details and damages reported.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the other driver was at fault and damages matched reported estimates.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and policy limits was proposed to the policyholder for review.
The policyholder provided positive feedback regarding the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved after acceptance of the settlement offer by the customer without objections.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was successfully issued to the policyholderâ€™s designated account.
The claim was officially closed following successful payment and confirmation that no further issues remain.
